content: @WG-triage we will be pausing triage during the holiday break starting from 20.12 till 16.01

If you plan on triaging during the break you are free to do so but ensure you do not ping anyone or close any PR.

Thank you for all your efforts during a tough 2021 and wishing you happy holidays and looking forward to more in the new year.

Meetings will stay suspended for a few more months.

Thanks and stay safe
